TopicTitle: How do i do stuff in ksp on my mac?

Articles.Content:
Hello, kerbals i know that this is not a very interesting thread but I've got some questions for you firstly how do i turn on/off my UI screen on mac? Secondly how do i change between vessels in flight? And the other stuff is one the wiki here. Hope too see you soon JHM kerman.

Edited June 6, 2016 by Jeb-head-mug kerman
The Tutorials subforum is for offering answers. To ask questions, please use the Gameplay Questions subforum. To which your thread has been moved.
